Voracity.name: Voracity
Voracity.blurb: Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged in the last 3 seconds, her ability cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds. If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.
Voracity.description: Innate: Whenever an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of Katarina damaging them, her abilities'  cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds.
Voracity.description2: Innate - Sinister Steel: Whenever Katarina retrieves a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing 68 − 240 (based on level) (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 55 / 70 / 85 / 100% (based on level) AP)  magic damage and reducing  Shunpo's  cooldown by 78 / 84 / 90 / 96% (based on level).
Voracity.notes:
* Voracity's cooldown reduction will still take effect even after Katarina dies.
 Decoys count as champions for the takedown effect.
 Katarina can use Shunpo on Daggers in mid-air.
 However, the damage will not apply until it lands.

Bouncing Blade.name: Bouncing Blade
Bouncing Blade.blurb: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.
Bouncing Blade.description: Active: Katarina throws a Dagger to the target enemy that bounces to up to 2 nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to each target.
Bouncing Blade.description2: The Dagger then lands on the ground 350 units opposite from where it struck the target. The time to land from striking the target is the same regardless of distance traveled.
Bouncing Blade.notes:
* Bouncing Blades can hit targets in fog of war as well as stealthed ones.
 Bouncing Blade will not stop if the target dies before hitting it but it will vanish mid-air if it targeted a vanishing decoy.

Preparation.name: Preparation
Preparation.blurb: Katarina gains a burst of movement speed, tossing a Dagger into the air directly above herself.
Preparation.description: Active: Katarina tosses a Dagger into the air above her current location, gaining  ghost and a decaying  bonus movement speed until it lands after 1.25 seconds.

Shunpo.name: Shunpo
Shunpo.blurb: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.
Shunpo.description: Active: After a short delay, Katarina  blinks to the target location around the target unit or Dagger, dealing magic damage to the nearest enemy in range.
Shunpo.description2: Shunpo resets Katarina's basic attack timer.
Shunpo.description3: Upon blinking, Katarina remains in cast time for 0.15 seconds. Movement command buffering is also delayed by 0.85 seconds.
Shunpo.notes:
* Shunpo should be an instant ability but it has extra logic to consider which makes it have a short cast time before blinking.
 Katarina cannot target  wards, but she can target objects such as allied  Jarvan IV's  Demacian Standard,  Thresh's  Dark Passage or jungle plants.
  Flash can be used during cast time but it will not cancel the blink.
 If the target is very close to a wall and Katarina targets Shunpo behind the target, she can blink over the wall.

Death Lotus.name: Death Lotus
Death Lotus.blurb: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.
Death Lotus.description: Active: Katarina rapidly channels for 2.5 seconds, throwing a dagger every 0.166 seconds to up to 3 nearby enemy champions, dealing magic damage and applying  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds, reducing healing on the target by 60%.
Death Lotus.leveling:
Magic Damage Per Dagger:
25 / 31.25 / 37.5 / 43.75 / 50 (+ 22% bonus AD) (+ 19% AP)
Total Single-Target Damage:
375 / 468.75 / 562.5 / 656.25 / 750 (+ 330% bonus AD) (+ 285% AP)
Death Lotus.description2: Katarina does not need to have  vision of the targets to hit them, and she will prioritize the closest ones.
Death Lotus.notes:
* Death Lotus cannot be activated unless there is at least one enemy champion in range, and the ability will brighten up when one is nearby.
 Leaving Death Lotus radius while Katarina is channeling will not cause her to stop prematurely.

Death Lotus cannot be cancelled by movement and basic attack commands in the first and last 0.25 seconds of channelling.
  Spell shield will block and be consumed by only one dagger.
